name: 4-Seater Switch
description: A switch that requires four players to activate.

fields.name: Enabled Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that enables or triggers this actor.

fields.name: Switch State
fields.description: Defines the state of the switch.

0.name: Default
0.description: The switch is in its default state.

1.name: Remains Pressed
1.description: The switch remains pressed after being activated.
